note.p: Birth: Catton, near Norwich, Norfolk, England (05 February 1799)
Death: His house on Acton Green, Middlesex (01 November 1865)

Career: Assistant Librarian to Sir Joseph Banks; Assistant Secretary, Horticultural Society (1822-1841); Professor of Botany, University College London (1829-1860); Lecturer on Botany, Apothecaries Company (1836-1853); lost an eye in youth; died of apoplexy
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1866-1867 vol 15 pp xxx-xxxii
References: Gudrun Richardson, 'A Norfolk Network within the Royal Society' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 27-39, plate
R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
